chapters.title: Chapter 12: The Amyrlin Seat
chapters.info: Leane Sharif, p. 158 (122)—Keeper of the Chronicles under Siuan Sanche. She was raised from the Blue Ajah, the same Ajah as Siuan. She has short, dark hair, copper-colored skin, and is as tall as most men. She grew up in Arad Doman. See also Keeper of the Chronicles.
